signUp.weKnow: Sabemos que tienes una hermosa e interesante historia.
signUp.receive: Recibe un tema de conversación al día. Pruébanos GRATIS por un mes (luego solo $4.99/mes).
signUp.recurring: En Yester trabajamos con suscripción. Si decides comprar la suscripción, el pago inicial será...
createAccount.begin:
Empezar es sencillo. 
Comencemos con tu cuenta.
email_valid1: The E-mail Address must be a valid email address.
password_valid1: The Password must be at least 8 characters.
accept_terms1: Al ingresar estás aceptando nuestros términos y condiciones
protect_lbl1: Protegeremos tus datos como si fueran nuestros y nunca los compartiremos con nadie a menos que tu así lo quieras.
wisdom_lbl1: Dicen que la sabiduría viene con los años.
born_lbl1: Empecemos conociendo cuándo y dónde naciste?
lorem_lbl1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent tincidunt mi ligula. Phasellus erat metus, dictum.
before_lbl1_1: Sabemos que tienes una hermosa e interesante historia.
before_lbl2: Recibe un tema de conversación al día. Pruébanos GRATIS por un mes (luego solo $4.99/mes).
before_lbl5: En Yester trabajamos con suscripción. Si decides comprar la suscripción, el pago inicial será...
beforereg_lbl1:
Start it's simple. 
Let's begin with your account.
regbirth_lbl2: That's a great name! Now, let's meet properly to get you started.
regbirth_lbl3: When did you saw this beautiful Earth for the first time?
regbirth_lbl4: We collect this information to set your experience within the app.
regcountry_lbl3: What a great era for this legend to begin.
regcountry_lbl4: Where in the world did you happen to be born?
regcountry_lbl5: We collect this information to set your experience within the app.
onboarding.step1.title: We cant't wait to hear your story
onboarding.step1.description: Everyone has a story to tell. We know yours is definitely a really interesting one.
onboarding.step2.title: One day, one story
onboarding.step2.description: We'll guide you through daily question that will help us to get the conversation to get started.
onboarding.step3.title: You own your information
onboarding.step3.description: As you, we want to protect your personal information, so you decide when and with who you share it. Always!
